intor.en: Hope Bay Technologies, Inc. provides cloud computing solutions to businesses and individuals worldwide, including front-end and back-end software and hardware; storage, data center, power, and energy management applications; and other cloud services. HB Mobile Inc., founded in January 2016 as a division of Hope Bay Technologies, focuses solely on developing cloud storage solutions for mobile devices. HB Mobile’s first product, Tera, is an extensive and seamless cloud memory extension for smartphones running Android system.
intor.zh: 和沛科技股份有限公司，提供全世界企業及個人各式前後端之軟硬體雲端運算解決方案，包括雲端儲存、資料中心、運算能力、能源管理應用程式，以及其他雲端服務。和沛移動成立於2016年1月，為和沛科技關係企業的一員。和沛移動專注於開發行動裝置端的雲端儲存相關方案。其首發產品Tera，即為能夠廣泛且無縫地應用在各種Andriod智慧手機上的雲記憶體。
